funding-source.institution: This study was funded by the Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico – CNPq, Fundação Centro de Hemoterapia e Hematologia do Pará (HEMOPA), Instituto Evandro Chagas, Universidade Federal do Pará and Instituto René Rachou/FIOCRUZ-Minas. The authors thank the Program for Technological Development in Tools for Health-RPT-FIOCRUZ for using the flow cytometry facilities. PFCV, LRVA, OAMF, ATC received PQ fellowships from CNPq.
